excerpt: The TMCM-6211 is a sextuple axis stepper motor controller/driver module for sensorless load dependent current control. The device is powered by Trinamic StallGuard2™, CoolStep™, SpreadCycle™, StealthChop™ and DcStep™ technology and has a SixPoint™ ramp generator. TMCM-6211 is capable of driving up to 1A of current from each output (with proper heatsinking). It is designed for an operating voltage of 10.5...27V. The device provides a USB, EtherCAT and 6 encoder interfaces. An integrated protocol processor supplies a high level CANopen over EtherCAT communication.All you need to get started is a power supply and Trinamic's free and easy to use TMCL-IDE. This graphical user interface allows quick setup and supports the use of commands in direct mode, monitors real-time behavior visualized in graphs, and logs and stores data.More about the TMCL-IDESpecial FeaturesMicroPlyer™StallGuard2™CoolStep™SpreadCycle™StealthChop™short detection
